response:
```python
def my_func(input1: str):
    score = 0
    rolls = list(input1)
    frame = 0
    i = 0

    while frame < 10 and i < len(rolls):
        if rolls[i] == 'X':  # Strike
            score += 10
            if i + 1 < len(rolls):
                score += 10 if rolls[i + 1] == 'X' else 0 if rolls[i + 1] == '-' else int(rolls[i + 1]) if rolls[i + 1] != '/' else 10 - int(rolls[i - 1])
            if i + 2 < len(rolls):
                score += 10 if rolls[i + 2] == 'X' else 0 if rolls[i + 2] == '-' else int(rolls[i + 2]) if rolls[i + 2] != '/' else 10 - int(rolls[i + 1])
            frame += 1
            i += 1
        elif rolls[i] == '/':  # Spare
            score += 10 - int(rolls[i - 1])
            if i + 1 < len(rolls):
                score += 10 if rolls[i + 1] == 'X' else 0 if rolls[i + 1] == '-' else int(rolls[i + 1])
            frame += 1
            i += 1
        elif rolls[i] == '-':  # Miss
            i += 1
        else:  # Number roll
            score += int(rolls[i])
            if i + 1 < len(rolls):
                if rolls[i + 1] == '/':
                    i += 1
            frame += 0.5
            i += 1

    return score
```
